item.description: Make File Commander accessible from the main menu.
Make File Commander accessible from the Extensions menu.
Save the left folder list location on exit.
Save the right folder list location on exit.
Show directories on first or last in list.(must restart File Commander)
Show message if File Commander is not running and all Task's are completed.
Show message if a background script ends successefully. Has 'stout', then this is displayed as additional info.

item.text: Number of lines in script messages
item.description: Set for 'stout' and 'sterr' the number of lines in script info or script error messages.
Show unknown file extensions with 'Addon File-Viewer'.

item.text: Edit position is the line end
item.description: If editing a file, can you set the cursor start position at end or begin of the line.
Swap buttons right/left with channel plus/minus or the channel button changed always the side.
Default sorting method for files on the left side.
Default sorting method for files on the right side.
Default sorting method for directories on both sides.
Default folder if the left or right folder isn't saved, and target folder for button 5.
Filter extension for 'My Extension' setting of 'Filter extension'. Use the extension name without a '.'.
Filter visible file classes by extension.
Default CPU priority (nice) for executed scripts. This can reduce the load so that scripts do not interfere with the rest of the system. (higher values = lower priority)
Default I/O priority (ionice) for executed scripts. This can reduce the load so that scripts do not interfere with the rest of the system. (higher values = lower priority)
File checksums to calculate for button 9
Time between slides in image viewer slideshow.
